result.arabic_text: ۞ أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ بَدَّلُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ كُفۡرٗا وَأَحَلُّواْ قَوۡمَهُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡبَوَارِ
result.translation: Did you not see those who exchanged Allah’s blessings with disbelief[20], and led their people to the abode of ruin[21]?
result.footnotes:
[20] They met Allah’s blessings with denial instead of gratitude.
 [21] i.e., the Hellfire.
